content: a classic and easy-to-wear raglan knit in vintage and aerial color **finished measurements** chest/bust 36 40 45 49 53 57 62 66 70 / 91 5 102 114 124 5 137 145 158 168 178 cm length 20 21 21½ 22 22½ 23 24 24½ 25½ / 51 53 54 5 56 57 58 5 61 62 65 cm shown in size 45 / 114 cm recommended ease approximately 8 10 / 20 25 5 cm positive ease **yarn** berroco vintage 100 grs 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 7 8 hanks #51139 peach mc berroco aerial color 25 grs 3 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 7 balls #34111 dickens cc original version berroco ultra wool handpaint 100 grs 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 7 8 balls #33301 sangria mc berroco aerial 25 grs 3 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 7 balls #3421 plum cc **needles and notions** 32 / 80 cm circular needles sizes 7 / 4 5 mm and 9 / 5 5 mm or size to obtain gauge 16 / 40 cm circular needles sizes 7 / 4 5 mm and 9 / 5 5 mm 1 set each double-pointed needles or needles of your choice for working small rounds sizes 7 / 4 5 mm and 9 / 5 5 mm 4 stitch markers tapestry needle waste yarn to hold stitches or stitch holders **gauge** 16 sts and 22 row/rnds = 4 / 10 cm in st st on larger needles with mc and cc held together
